actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1003 of title 38, United States Code, relating to memorial areas and appropriate memorials to honor the memory of certain deceased members of the Armed Forces whose remains were buried at sea, have not been identified, or were nonrecoverable.

summary.text: Authorizes access to memorial areas and appropriate memorials to honor the memory of those deceased members of the Armed Forces whose remains have been donated for use in medical research or training in the same manner as provided for the remains of those deceased members whose remains are buried at sea, have not been identified, or were nonrecoverable.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1003 of title 38, United States Code, relating to memorial areas and appropriate memorials to honor the memory of certain deceased members of the Armed Forces whose remains were buried at sea, have not been identified, or were nonrecoverable.
